ui.notice_tbd: “TBD” = “to be determined”. This roadmap is informational and not medical advice.

2019-01-dx-staging.title: Initial diagnosis — T‑lymphoblastic lymphoma; staging
2019-01-dx-staging.summary: Baseline work‑up confirmed T‑lymphoblastic lymphoma; staging and baseline tests completed.
2019-01-dx-staging.details: Hematology consultation, imaging and biopsies established the diagnosis and stage. Baseline cardiac function and labs recorded before therapy.

2019-03-first-chemo-rt.title: Chemotherapy for T‑lymphoblastic lymphoma
2019-03-first-chemo-rt.summary: Systemic chemotherapy with supportive care; adjuvant radiotherapy.
2019-03-first-chemo-rt.details: Planned cycles with interim response assessment and end‑of‑treatment evaluation. Radiotherapy delivered as consolidation (~30 sessions).

2020-04-relapse-dx.title: Relapse — T‑lymphoblastic lymphoma (confirmed)
2020-04-relapse-dx.details: Diagnostic review reconfirmed T‑LBL; systemic therapy indicated.

2020-04-11-chemo-rt-mi.title: Chemotherapy + RT×30; severe GI bleed and myocardial infarction
2020-04-11-chemo-rt-mi.summary: Chemo and radiotherapy resumed; ulcer bleeding led to MI; treatment continued after stabilization.
2020-04-11-chemo-rt-mi.details: Severe anemia and tachyarrhythmia managed with transfusions and intensive care. Radiotherapy delivered in parallel with chemotherapy (~30 sessions).

2021-05-aggressive-leukocytosis-dx.title: Aggressive leukemia with extreme leukocytosis — diagnosis
2021-05-aggressive-leukocytosis-dx.details: Rapid leukemic course (later Ph+ features); urgent cytoreduction and transfusion support required.

2021-05-2023-09-chemo-aggr-leukemia.title: Chemotherapy against aggressive leukemia
2021-05-2023-09-chemo-aggr-leukemia.summary: Prolonged systemic therapy to reach CAR‑T eligibility and control disease.
2021-05-2023-09-chemo-aggr-leukemia.details: Escalating/adaptive regimens targeted WBC reduction below CAR‑T threshold; intercurrent infections managed along the way.

2022-03-26-neuro-shock.title: Systemic shock with paralysis and amnesia
2022-03-26-neuro-shock.summary: Resuscitation required; neurologic deficits followed by gradual recovery.
2022-03-26-neuro-shock.details: Acute collapse required resuscitation. Afterwards: paralysis, motor aphasia/amnesia, slowed cognition; stepwise recovery under neurology follow‑up.

2022-10-invasive-fungal-sepsis.title: Invasive fungal infection with sepsis
2022-10-invasive-fungal-sepsis.summary: Severe oropharyngeal focus with systemic involvement; successfully treated.
2022-10-invasive-fungal-sepsis.details: Inpatient antimicrobial therapy; concomitant arrhythmias and 2022 micro‑stroke‑like symptoms noted.

2022-12-covid-icu-gi-bleed.title: COVID‑19 pneumonia (ICU, intubation) and GI bleeding; recovery
2022-12-covid-icu-gi-bleed.summary: Critical course with intubation and coma; bleeding and immunosuppression; subsequent stabilization.
2022-12-covid-icu-gi-bleed.details: Rapid deterioration of pneumonia on immunosuppression → ICU, intubation and coma; post‑ICU rehabilitation with gradual stabilization.

2023-06-respiratory-arrest-sepsis.title: Respiratory arrest (resuscitated) and bacteremia; intensified chemotherapy
2023-06-respiratory-arrest-sepsis.summary: Event controlled; rare bacteremia treated; chemo intensified to reach CAR‑T threshold.
2023-06-respiratory-arrest-sepsis.details: Therapy escalated to lower WBC below CAR‑T threshold; intercurrent infections treated as detected.

2023-10-car-t.title: CAR‑T therapy
2023-10-car-t.summary: CAR‑T performed; severe toxicity (fever, neuro‑ and cardiac events) managed.
2023-10-car-t.details: High fever, vomiting, transient leg paralysis… Findings consistent with neurotoxicity; gradual recovery afterwards.

2024-01-allo-sct-brother-bradonor.title: Allogeneic stem cell infusion — sibling donor
2024-01-allo-sct-brother-bradonor.summary: Allogeneic stem cells infused as consolidation post CAR‑T.
2024-01-allo-sct-brother-bradonor.details: Engraftment phase under strict infection control; then ambulatory recovery.

2024-07-abdominal-mass-hl.title: Large abdominal mass; aggressive Hodgkin lymphoma
2024-07-abdominal-mass-hl.summary: New HL distinct from prior disease; treatment strategy revised.
2024-07-abdominal-mass-hl.details: Considered possibly related to prior therapies… Oncology proposed a new chemo strategy.

2024-08-2025-06-chemo-rt.title: Escalated chemotherapy → sepsis → switch to effective regimen; RT×30
2024-08-2025-06-chemo-rt.summary: Initial high dose caused sepsis; switched to a better‑tolerated effective regimen; added radiotherapy (30 sessions).
2024-08-2025-06-chemo-rt.details: After septic episode, regimen adjusted for tolerability and effect. Radiotherapy added for consolidation (30 daily sessions).

2025-06-relapse-Ph-pos.title: Rising leukocytes; Ph+ lymphoid cells
2025-06-relapse-Ph-pos.summary: WBC rose from ~35k to ~67k in days; Ph+ lymphoid lineage identified.
2025-06-relapse-Ph-pos.details: Oncology proposed oral chemotherapy followed by TKI (ponatinib) after stabilization.

2025-07-oral-chemo-14.title: Oral multi‑agent chemotherapy (14 doses)
2025-07-oral-chemo-14.summary: Structured per‑oral regimen at home, total of 14 doses.
2025-07-oral-chemo-14.details: Complex oral combination with interim laboratory and tolerance monitoring; decision points defined after completion.

plan-2025-support-recovery.title: Support and functional recovery
plan-2025-support-recovery.details: Scope and schedule tailored to post‑chemo status and lab dynamics.

plan-2025-tki-lifelong.title: Tyrosine kinase inhibitor (ponatinib) — long‑term
plan-2025-tki-lifelong.summary: Maintenance TKI after cytoreduction; likely long‑term/lifelong.
plan-2025-tki-lifelong.details: Start after acceptable hematologic control; monitor response and AEs; dose titration expected.

plan-2025-re-irradiation.title: Possible re‑irradiation
plan-2025-re-irradiation.summary: Option if local control is needed.
plan-2025-re-irradiation.details: To be discussed at tumor board; depends on imaging and prior RT doses.

plan-2025-chemo-switch.title: Possible switch of current chemotherapy protocol
plan-2025-chemo-switch.summary: Switch if response is inadequate or toxicity unacceptable.
plan-2025-chemo-switch.details: Decision after reassessment of labs, imaging and tolerability; an alternative protocol chosen if indicated.

plan-2025-next-line-chemo.title: Possible additional line of chemotherapy
plan-2025-next-line-chemo.details: To be determined by tumor board after evaluation of the current course.

plan-2026-repeat-allo-sct.title: Possible repeat allogeneic stem cell transplantation
plan-2026-repeat-allo-sct.summary: Option for definitive consolidation if required.
plan-2026-repeat-allo-sct.details: Depends on response to TKI and chemotherapy; would require donor/center evaluation and risk‑benefit analysis.
